title: gamma

# gamma

Displays Options Gamma Levels for a Stock.

### Usage

```python wordwrap
/gamma ticker [expiry]
```

---

## Parameters

| Name | Description | Optional | Choices |
| ---- | ----------- | -------- | ------- |
| ticker | Stock Ticker | False | None |
| expiry | Gamma from now until expiry | True | None |


---

## Examples

```
/gamma AMD
```

```
/gamma AMD 2022-07-29
```

---
